Class VTarget

java.lang.Object
app.photofox.vipsffm.VTarget
Direct Known Subclasses:
VCustomTarget
public sealed class VTarget extends Object permits VCustomTarget

Represents a VipsTarget

Its constructor is package private to prevent leaking MemorySegments in to the vips-ffm API

Use its static helper methods to create new targets

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    final boolean
    equals(Object o)
     
    VBlob
    getBlob()
    Only valid for memory-backed targets (eg via newToMemory(Arena))
    MemorySegment
    getUnsafeStructAddress()
    Gets the raw MemorySegment (C pointer) for this VipsTarget struct
    int
    hashCode()
     
    static VTarget
    newFromOutputStream(Arena arena, OutputStream stream)

    Create a new VipsTarget pointed at a Java OutputStream

    The provided OutputStream is coupled to the arena's lifetime, and closed when its scope ends

    Note that you can directly write an image to an OutputStream using VImage.writeToStream(java.io.OutputStream, java.lang.String, app.photofox.vipsffm.VipsOption...)

    This target can also be used with (for example) VImage.writeToTarget(app.photofox.vipsffm.VTarget, java.lang.String, app.photofox.vipsffm.VipsOption...)

    • getUnsafeStructAddress

      public MemorySegment getUnsafeStructAddress()

      Gets the raw MemorySegment (C pointer) for this VipsTarget struct

      The memory address' lifetime is bound to the scope of the arena that created it

      Usage of the memory address is strongly discouraged, but it is available if some functionality is missing, and you need to use it with VipsHelper

    • newToDescriptor

      public static VTarget newToDescriptor(Arena arena, int descriptor) throws VipsError

      Create a new target pointed at a file descriptor

      This target can be used with (for example) VImage.writeToTarget(app.photofox.vipsffm.VTarget, java.lang.String, app.photofox.vipsffm.VipsOption...)

      Throws:
      VipsError

    • newToFile

      public static VTarget newToFile(Arena arena, String filename) throws VipsError

      Create a new target pointed at an output file

      This target can be used with (for example) VImage.writeToTarget(app.photofox.vipsffm.VTarget, java.lang.String, app.photofox.vipsffm.VipsOption...)

      Throws:
      VipsError

    • newToMemory

      public static VTarget newToMemory(Arena arena) throws VipsError

      Create a new memory-backed VipsTarget

      This target can be used with (for example) VImage.writeToTarget(app.photofox.vipsffm.VTarget, java.lang.String, app.photofox.vipsffm.VipsOption...)

      After writing to this target, you can also retrieve the backing VBlob with getBlob()

      Throws:
      VipsError

    • getBlob

      public VBlob getBlob() throws VipsError

      Only valid for memory-backed targets (eg via newToMemory(Arena))

      Returns the contents of the backing VBlob

      Throws:
      VipsError

    • newFromOutputStream

      public static VTarget newFromOutputStream(Arena arena, OutputStream stream) throws VipsError

      Create a new VipsTarget pointed at a Java OutputStream

      The provided OutputStream is coupled to the arena's lifetime, and closed when its scope ends

      Note that you can directly write an image to an OutputStream using VImage.writeToStream(java.io.OutputStream, java.lang.String, app.photofox.vipsffm.VipsOption...)

      This target can also be used with (for example) VImage.writeToTarget(app.photofox.vipsffm.VTarget, java.lang.String, app.photofox.vipsffm.VipsOption...)

      Throws:
      VipsError
